title: Fresh Forums
text: Welcome to the Fresh Forums. News and Announcements regarding the forums and hotel updates and downtimes will be posted here. If you have a suggestion for the forum or hotels, or a bug report for them, post here in the appropriate section. Listed below are the official servers run by Fresh Networks, with 24/7 uptime and no lag. Our main and original website, Fresh Hotel has been running for over 4 years with no plans to stop soon. This category is for anything other than Fresh and Fresh RP related discussion. If you want to post something and there is no other section to cover your topic, post it here! Just read an amazing book and wish to share it with others? Or even share your own poem? Post it here. If you have a song, video or picture to share, here is the place to share it. Are you a gamer? PC, Xbox, PlayStation, its all allowed here! Are you a Movie or TV Series fan? Share your favorites, and your insights here. Spam to your hearts content! Post count does not increase. There are currently 1227 users online. 0 members and 1227 guests Most users ever online was 4,475, 07-23-2025 at 08:38 AM. Welcome to our newest member, neetexam
